channel.title: A very good (to me) burried post in Q&A
channel.description:
I spent about an hour reading up on your game, and really look forward to it. But the most important question on my mind was one that was not on Conti's interesting posts, ( [url]https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/User:Conti#Levels[/url]) or the big list of links in the Level's section ([url]https://www.isblackmesareleased.com/#[/url]) but really should be.
I watch Ross Scott's 'Freeman's mind' episodes and really laugh how a lot of the puzzles are down right absurd far too often.
Then I found the small glimmer of clarification I was dying to learn about with that in mind, and think a lot of others will appreciate hearing about as well:
[url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=267845&postcount=9885[/url]
I look forward to the release, it sounds and looks great.

item.title: A very good (to me) burried post in Q&A
item.dc:creator: Samapico
item.description:
icthulu:

By his tone, I assumed he was. I am afraid I don’t know who’s who.

Is the information wrong?

Developers have a specific title under their nickname in bold text.

That said, it doesn’t mean what non-devs say is wrong. It’s sometimes based on what devs said earlier, but it can also be pure speculation.

Read full topic
item.source: A very good (to me) burried post in Q&A

item.title: A very good (to me) burried post in Q&A
item.dc:creator: icthulu
item.description:
By his tone, I assumed he was. I am afraid I don’t know who’s who.

Is the information wrong?

higgsboson:

Wow I feel honoured that there’s an entire thread about my post

It deserves it. This point will make or break the game they are creating, and will be the most contentious topic as what they do or don’t do will be celebrated, reviled, double guessed, and all sorts of opinionated things…

Read full topic
item.source: A very good (to me) burried post in Q&A

item.title: A very good (to me) burried post in Q&A

item.description:
icthulu:

But the most important question on my mind was one that was not on Conti’s interesting posts, (…) but really should be.

My list has only developers answers, the best and reliable source about the mod.

item.title: A very good (to me) burried post in Q&A
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I’ve heard that they redesigned the “box smashing room” (Ross Scott’s term) to make it more sensible and logical.

Read full topic

item.title: A very good (to me) burried post in Q&A
item.dc:creator: icthulu
item.description:
I spent about an hour reading up on your game, and really look forward to it. But the most important question on my mind was one that was not on Conti’s interesting posts, ( https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/User:Conti#Levels) or the big list of links in the Level’s section (https://www.isblackmesareleased.com/#) but really should be.

I watch Ross Scott’s ‘Freeman’s mind’ episodes and really laugh how a lot of the puzzles are down right absurd far too often.

Then I found the small glimmer of clarification I was dying to learn about with that in mind, and think a lot of others will appreciate hearing about as well:

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=267845&postcount=9885

I look forward to the release, it sounds and looks great.

Read full topic
